moves.5... Nd4 6. Nc3 Nf6: ...Nxb5; Nb5 Qc6 is more normal. and ok for Black.
...Qd6 is better and prevents losing the Rook.
moves.15... Ba3 16. Qe2 b6 17. Bc4 Bb7 18. Bd5: Rad1 seems better. if ...Bb7, Nxb6 axb6 and  white pushes d4.
moves.21. Nxb6+: Rab1 is better, saving a move. 21.Rab1 Kb7 22.Nc7! f5 23.Nb5
moves.21... axb6 22. Rab1 Kb7 23. Qe2: 23.f4 is better, attacking the center and keeping the passer blockaded.
moves.23... Rc8 24. Qc2 Qf4 25. Rfe1 Qd2 26. R: oops. Qxd2, cxd still for black advantage, but better than Re2 Qxe2; Qxe2 c2; Rf1 c1/Q.
moves.37. Ra5 Kb6 38. Raa4: Ra8 to see if it may be a draw. Black must then see the win...
